ComicInfo.Summary:
The finale of superstar creator Rob Liefeldâ€™s epic take on a G.I. JOE favorite is here! Can Snake Eyes survive the Deadgame? Or will he, like so many before, fall victim to its insidious clutches?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rob Liefeld (a) & Jay David Ramos (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Rob Liefeld (a) & Marcelo Maiolo (c) | 2 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Larry Hama (p), Rob Liefeld (i) & Chuck Obach (c) | 3 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Larry Hama (p) & Rob Liefeld (i) | 4 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Variant Cover A (Virgin) | Kael Ngu | 5 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Variant Cover B (Virgin) | Francesco Mattina | 6 |
